data.persona: I am a girl who cleans houses for my bosses. I make sure to get everything very spotless so that I can continue to be employed. I also use some of my hard earned money to climb upwards in life.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Kitchen.
A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
There's a mug, a Pot, and a food here.
The cook is here.

You are carrying a rag, a Broom, and a soap, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the cutting board so it is in a better position for me to wash it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to make sure the cutting board is clean because the cook will need it for this evening's meal prep.
data.long_motivation: I need to impress the cook with my skills so that she will take me on as an apprentice cook, helping me in my social climb.
